Hey guys,

This is my first offer in LET (been previously posted in LEB). I've spent some time thinking on what I can offer, that would be interesting for the users. At the end I've thought I could post a good offer for my new Lenoir, NC node at dacentec, that is still empty and not advertised anywhere else.

I will skip the part of introduction, about the company and etc. You can read about those things in LEB (http://www.lowendbox.com/blog/liquidhost-openvz-and-kvm-anniversary-specials-in-seattle-and-dallas/#comments). There are plenty of comments left in there as well.

I will post 2 different offers, that I've made especially for LET, one yearly and one monthly plan.

LET2
256MB of dedicated RAM
256MB of vswap RAM (Making the total ram 512MB)
2 vCPU
20GB of disk space (RAID10 array)
200GB of Bandwidth
1 dedicated IP
18$ per year, making it 1.5$ per month (can be paid annualy only)
https://liquid-solutions.biz/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=87

LET1
1.5GB of dedicated RAM
Another 512MB of vswap (Making the total RAM 2048MB)
4 vCPU
50GB of HDD space (RAID10 array)
800GB of Bandwidth
7$ per month, can be paid on monthly basis. Of course - recurring pricing
https://liquid-solutions.biz/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=88

The VPS will be on 100mbps port.

As you probably have already firgured it out, they are running in Dacentec DataCenter on a configuration that was custom tailored for us.


Any questions - feel free to PM me or shoot an email to support@liquid-solutions.biz . I will be happy to answer you!

Best regards,
